ancestries.name: elf
ancestries.description: Learn 1 spell. You cannot be beguiled or put to sleep by magic. You live twice as long as other ancestries.
ancestries.specialText: You cannot be beguiled or put to sleep by magic. You live twice as long as other ancestries.

ancestries.name: dwarf
ancestries.description: Increase 1 skill. You can see fine in low light and resist the effects of poisons and ale.
ancestries.specialText: You can see fine in low light and resist the effects of poisons and ale.

ancestries.name: orc
ancestries.description: Increase 1 skill. If you would be harmed, roll a d6. On a 5 or higher, you shrug off the injury.
ancestries.specialText: If you would be harmed, roll a d6. On a 5 or higher, you shrug off the injury.

ancestries.name: goblin
ancestries.description: Increase 1 skill. You roll a d6 instead of a d4 when hindered unless you wear or carry any heavy items.
ancestries.specialText: You roll a d6 instead of a d4 when hindered unless you wear or carry any heavy items.

ancestries.name: devilkin
ancestries.description: Learn 1 spell. You are immune to fire and cold.
ancestries.specialText: You are immune to fire and cold.

ancestries.name: dragonkin
ancestries.description: Learn 1 skill. You can breathe fire and can't be hurt by it.
ancestries.specialText: You can breathe fire and can't be hurt by it.

ancestries.name: centaur
ancestries.description: Learn 1 skill. You can carry an additional heavy item.
ancestries.specialText: You can carry an additional heavy item.

ancestries.name: dryad
ancestries.description: Learn 1 spell. You can understand and speak to plants.
ancestries.specialText: You can understand and speak to plants.

ancestries.name: beastkin
ancestries.description: Learn 4 skills. You are hindered when using any skill you aren't trained in.
ancestries.specialText: You are hindered when using any skill you aren't trained in.
